effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 17,225 Agility for 15 sec.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,609 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 307,479 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,559 Agility and absorbing 1.5 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of Infinite Potential

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
